name: Snapizo
tag_list: iphone-application, custom-designs, photo-sharing, create-desings, custom-shirts, custom-apparel-and-products, group-design
overview: Iphone application where you can snap a picture, edit it, share it with friends, and put your snapshot on any t-shirt, hat, hoodie or any other product you find in Customizo.com’s catalog. With Snapizo you can also access your album on your phone to share, edit, or send to your Customizo account to create custom apparel and products. Snapizo is an innovative way to create a cool graphic or image or t-shirts to just to share with friends through social media. Also with Snapizo, you can also send your design to a social platform called Groupizo (it’s Customizo.com’s social platform where groups can design together, chat, vote on their favorite designs, and even purchase and ship products individually). The iphone application is free so download it and check it out for yourself.
